action.name: Set text
action.param: "XPOS - " & PlayerObject.X & " YPOS - " & PlayerObject.Y & " PLAYERHP - " & PlayerObject.HP & " LEVEL - " & CurrentLevel & " GAMEMODE - " & gamemode & " DIALOG - " & CoolDialogue & " VECTORX - " & PlayerObject.Platform.VectorX & " VECTORY - " & PlayerObject.Platform.VectorY

events.comment: note for later: potentially look into adding a speedrun timer which displays both current time in a level aswell as full time. one way of potentially doing it (tho probably rlly dumb) is to have a timer behavior affect various variables
